org.agilewiki.jactor2.metrics

Class MetricsRecovery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant.Recovery
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.metrics.MetricsRecovery

  • public class MetricsRecovery
extends Recovery
    Metrics class for managing failure detection and recovery. The default Recovery is created by MPlantConfiguration.
